 2019-00932019-02-08,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada of ALEXANDRA SUDA of Toronto, Ontario, as Director of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective April 19, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
